H8671.def: = state in which a countable entity is the ninth in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6106.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H5564.def: = action by which humans put their hand(s) on another human, an animal, or an object ► often as a ritual before sacrifice or a sign of authority or punishment

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H4912.def: = an utterance, often in poetic style, that has a specific message, such as an oracle, words of advice, wisdom, or mockery

H4805.def: = action by which humans reject the authority of someone to which they had formerly been subjected

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H3332.def: = process by which liquids flow from one place to another

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H3409.def: = the upper part of the leg of humans and animals

H3802.def: = the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H4005.def: = state in which persons or objects have been selected for their superior competencies or quality

H6106.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H4885.def: poetic term; = state in which humans, deities, and animals feel and show great joy

H4261.def: = inanimate objects that are the object of someone's desire, ◄ because of their quality or value

H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2045.def: = information concerning a things that have happened

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6605.def: = process by which objects open up ► in order to give access to something located inside or to create a passage

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H481.def: = to be unable to speak ◄ because of a physical limitation or because of emotions

H4159.def: = object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
